SELECT a.id , a.consumerId , a.concertId , a.paymentId , a.bookNum , a.price , a.seatCnt , a.seatNum , a.grade , a.orderDate , a.concertTime , b.title , b.hallType , b.categoryId , b.posterUrl , r.id as review_id , r.consumerId , r.concertId , r.rate , r.content , r.createDate , r.updateDate FROM book a LEFT JOIN concert b ON a.concertId = b.id LEFT JOIN review r ON a.concertId = r.concertId and a.consumerId = r.consumerId WHERE 1=1 and a.consumerId = 1 and concertTime <= now() ORDER BY r.createDate DESC
mapper.insert: insert into book (consumerId, concertId, cardId, bookNum, price, seatNum, grade, orderDate, concertTime, payType) values (#{consumerId}, #{concertId}, #{cardId}, #{bookNum}, #{price}, #{seatNum}, #{grade}, #{orderDate}, #{concertTime}, #{payType})
